##### Need a dedicated server, but your budget is limited? #####

====== Do not worry! We have the solution for you! Keep reading this post =====

At LinkAlone Networks we strive to provide the best VPS services, powered by OpenVZ and SolusVM, along with great uptime and fast deployment!

All Vps plans are self-managed and comes by default with:

Solus VM Control Panel
Open VZ Virtualization
Root Access via SSH
FREE Setup
